ca.corefacility.gview.map.items

Interface MapComponent

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BackboneItem, BackboneShapeItem, BackboneTextItem, FeatureItem, MapItem, ShapeItem, TextItem
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBackboneShapeItem, AbstractBackboneTextItem, AbstractShapeItem, BackboneLabelItem, BackboneTextItemImp, BasicBackboneItem, BasicItem, BorderItem, FeatureItemImp, FeatureItemsCache, FeaturesLayer, LabelLineItem, Layer, LegendEntryItem, LegendItem, OptimizedLayer, PlotItem, PlotLayer, SlotLayer, TextItemImp

    public interface MapComponent
    Defines something that can go onto a map.
    Author:
    Aaron Petkau
